reviews.Title: No complaints
reviews.Comment: If you want a compact, easy-to-hold-and-use phone that doesn't compromise on performance at all (while giving you all-day battery life) - this is it. Couldn't be happier with my upgrade from the iPhone SE. I recommend using only up to 15W chargers if you want to avoid the phone becoming unusually warm when plugged in. Charge times are still excellent if you want to slip in a quick charge for 20-30 minutes. It should give you enough battery life for half a day.
